验证上下文数据
高优先级验证器区域的结束索引（同时也是普通验证器区域的起始索引）
该索引将验证器列表划分为两个区域：[0, _highPriorityEndIndex) 为高优先级验证器区域（按 升序排列），[_highPriorityEndIndex, Count) 为普通验证器区域。当添加新验证器时，高优先级验证器会插入到指定位置以维持顺序，普通验证器则直接追加到列表末尾，此索引值会相应更新以维护区域边界。

卡号
Pattern:
^[1-9]\\d{11,18}$
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match a character in the set [1-9].
○ Match a Unicode digit atomically at least 11 and at most 18 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

○ Match a character in the set [\u00B7\u4E00-\u9FA5] atomically at least 2 and at most 16 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

高优先级验证器区域的结束索引（同时也是普通验证器区域的起始索引）
该索引将验证器列表划分为两个区域：[0, _highPriorityEndIndex) 为高优先级验证器区域（按 升序排列），[_highPriorityEndIndex, Count) 为普通验证器区域。当添加新验证器时，高优先级验证器会插入到指定位置以维持顺序，普通验证器则直接追加到列表末尾，此索引值会相应更新以维护区域边界。

Pattern:
^(?:(?:\\d{3}-)?\\d{8}|(?:\\d{4}-)?\\d{7,8})(?:-\\d+)?$
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match with 2 alternative expressions.
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Optional (greedy).
○ Match a Unicode digit exactly 3 times.
○ Match '-'.
○ Match a Unicode digit exactly 8 times.
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Optional (greedy).
○ Match a Unicode digit exactly 4 times.
○ Match '-'.
○ Match a Unicode digit greedily at least 7 and at most 8 times.
○ Optional (greedy).
○ Match '-'.
○ Match a Unicode digit atomically at least once.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

用户名验证器
长度 4-16 位，以字母开头，支持字母、数字、下划线、减号组合。 不允许包含空格或其他特殊字符，禁止连续特殊字符（如 __）。
Pattern:
^[a-zA-Z](?!.*[_-]{2})[\\w-]{2,14}[a-zA-Z0-9]$
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match an ASCII letter.
○ Zero-width negative lookahead.
○ Match a character other than '\n' greedily any number of times.
○ Match a character in the set [\-_] exactly 2 times.
○ Match a character in the set [\-\w] greedily at least 2 and at most 14 times.
○ Match an ASCII letter or digit.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.
